simplesect.title: NAME
simplesect.simpara: git-check-mailmap - Show canonical names and email addresses of contacts

simplesect.title: DESCRIPTION
simplesect.simpara: For each Name <user@host> or <user@host> from the command-line or standard input (when using --stdin), look up the person's canonical name and email address (see "Mapping Authors" below). If found, print them; otherwise print the input as-is.

listitem.simpara: Read contacts, one per line, from the standard input after exhausting contacts provided on the command-line.

simplesect.title: OUTPUT
simplesect.simpara: For each contact, a single line is output, terminated by a newline. If the name is provided or known to the mailmap, Name <user@host> is printed; otherwise only <user@host> is printed.

simplesect.title: CONFIGURATION
simplesect.simpara: See mailmap.file and mailmap.blob in for how to specify a custom .mailmap target file or object.
